::Vamprah::

"That was a great time" said Vamprah "Most of the time, we haven't 
any thing to do, and the boss let us do whatever we wanted... When he 
had a... job -he just took the bots that they needed... that's 
happened with murders and when he decided that was time to steal 
protophoms in order to get new recluits.I was all my life since I 
remember in that group, so that I was one of those protophorms... "
